alert.note: Alert for Coastal Onslow; Inland Onslow; Jones; Southern Craven; West Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 12:31AM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Jones, south central Craven, northeastern Onslow and western Carteret Counties through 115 AM EDT... At 1231 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pumpkin Center, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Half Moon, Pumpkin Center, Piney Green, Camp Lejeune Center, Stella, Swansboro, Hubert, Maysville, Silverdale, Kellum, Midway Park, Belgrade, Kuhns, Catfish Lake, Deppe, Loco VFD and Pollocksville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Onslow; Inland Onslow; Jones; Southern Craven; West Carteret
